comments.author: glibnes@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 558059
Screenshot with Bug

This strange Tab behaviour happened when I opened a new one with MiddleMouse click on some link. It happened twice today, the first time was when I have openned my Gmail account through the addon.

At first, this right tab was invisible (but browser was on that page).
When I moved the last tab, the invisible one appeared. Also, when I moved the left tab and released mouse button, it just stayed on this place (mouse pointer was around red dot).

When I closed this bugged tab, the problem disappeared after a while.
comments.creator: glibnes@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
This strange Tab behaviour happened when I opened a new one with MiddleMouse click on some link. It happened twice today, the first time was when I have openned my Gmail account through the addon.

At first, this right tab was invisible (but browser was on that page).
When I moved the last tab, the invisible one appeared. Also, when I moved the left tab and released mouse button, it just stayed on this place (mouse pointer was around red dot).

When I closed this bugged tab, the problem disappeared after a while.
